item.description:
Francesca suggested this place because it is an INDOOR venue! There is no fee for the use of their facility. We had to switch to the 2nd week of the month, and they only do these kinds of groups in the afternoon.

I don't know about all of you, but this sounds great for February! I hope everyone can make it!

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: North Shore Cavalier King Charles Spaniel February Meetup
